title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Poetry
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Grad 2016     Poetry                Poetry Grad 2016                              Poetry 7th Grade Experience   10 Photos  Teachers from Mack Lyon Middle School collaborated on a project in which students wrote different forms of poetry to capture their thoughts and feelings after the field trip experience.          10th Grade Poetry Experience   10 Photos  During the field trip, along the thirteen mile raft trip down the Black Canyon, students wrote a variety of poetry.
